name: Modular-robotics
tagline: This project will host some modular solutions to robotic vision, robotic arms, and other integrable sensors and actuators.
body:
### The Idea

The aim of this project is to gather different "abilities" which a robot could have, and to have them be modular as possible (so you can simply drop one ability and add another as need be).

My most immediate goal is to have a Raspberry Pi && Arduino based platform with basic vision, speech, and movement capability.

### Main Categories
We've done some work already getting the repositories 

* Vision with the Pi-Cam
  * Reading Seven Segment Displays
  * Reading Text
* Speech/Messaging
  * Direct Speech (Espeak)
  * Twitter
  * Text/Sms/Phone-Calls Twilio 
* Movement
  * Arduino control via py-serial
